about_the_game:
Meet loyal companions along your journey and raise your retinue. With 21 different classes and powerful relics to be found, you can build your soldiers into deadly weapons to turn the tides of battle.




Our goal is to recreate the feeling you get from looking at a medieval painting or manuscript, be it depicting battles against beasts, large armies colliding or sieges of a castle. A lot of the graphics style is directly inspired by medieval paintings, bringing them to life.




Start as a peasant and make your way into the top. Help the folk to reestablish order in a world taken by chaos, or steal everything out of them. Take over castles and become a powerful lord. Explore dungeons and caverns. Meet knight-errants travelling across the world. The world is alive, and is waiting for you to leave your mark.

short_description: Raise your own band of Knights and fight beasts from medieval paintings. Knights of Fresco is an open world party building RPG with auto-battling combat that tries to emulate medieval depictions of battles and wars.
